name: EggFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask Egg Facts to tell me a fact.”
”Alexa, tell Egg Facts to give me an egg fact.”
”Alexa, ask Egg Facts to give me trivia.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: egg facts
des: Egg Facts dispenses egg-related trivia upon request. If you had pressing questions about the inner or outer workings of eggs, look no further! Ask Egg Facts for a fact to get started.
